content:
The Russians also fired communities from artillery (5 explosions) and mortar (4 explosions).

About it in the morningMarch 20 reportedSumy Regional Military Administration.

In total, the Russians have carried out 16 shelling of border areas and settlements of Sumy region over the past day.

65 explosions were recorded. The shelling was suffered by Yunakovskaya, Miropilsk, Krasnopil, Velikopysarivska, Novoslobidskaya, and Esman communities.

In the Krasnopil community, the enemy beat the mortar (3 explosions), a grenade launcher (14 explosions).

The Miropil community was fired at artillery (31 explosions).

The Esman community was fired from small arms and mortars (2 explosions).

In the Novoslobid community, the Russians hit artillery (4 explosions).

The UAV (1 explosion) ammunition was thrown into the Yunak community.

Asreported the armyinformIn Kharkiv and Sumy region, Ukrainian television and radio were resumed after the Russian attack.
title: 15 managed aircraft enemy dropped on a large clerk in Sumy region
description: Sumy Regional Military Administration reported this in the morning of March 20. Total ...
author: Army Inform
